Containers.Name: binhex-onedrive
Containers.Description: OneDrive (previously SkyDrive, Windows Live SkyDrive, and Windows Live Folders) is a file hosting service that allows users to sync files and later access them from a web browser or mobile device. Users can share files publicly or with their contacts; publicly shared files do not require a Microsoft account to access them. OneDrive is included in the suite of online services formerly known as Windows Live.[br][br] [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] This is where onedrive will store it's configuration file, database and logs.[br] [b]/sync[/b] This path is used to syncronise files to/from onedrive.[br] [b]/media[/b] This is where onedrive will scan for media files.
Containers.Overview: OneDrive (previously SkyDrive, Windows Live SkyDrive, and Windows Live Folders) is a file hosting service that allows users to sync files and later access them from a web browser or mobile device. Users can share files publicly or with their contacts; publicly shared files do not require a Microsoft account to access them. OneDrive is included in the suite of online services formerly known as Windows Live.
Containers.DonateText: If you appreciate my work, then please consider buying me a beer :D
